value.0:
The Kashnir Arms KX-60 Blaster Rifle is a standard blaster rifle in service in many planetary militia's as well as some police forces. 

After the first few clashes between Imperial and Rebel forces, it became apparent that a rather large number of these weapons had found their way into Rebel Alliance hands. A short time after, all factories producing these weapons were shut down by ISB agents, and all manufacturing equipment was lifted off planet. It is likely, however, that these plants were opened up once more in secret locations beyond Imperial domain to arm the Rebel Alliance.

A blaster is a ranged weapon that fires bursts of particle beam energy called blaster bolts from a replaceable power cell. The most commonly used weapon in the Galaxy, blasters' intense beams consisting of compacted high-energy particles and intense light can kill or paralyze their target, depending on their setting.
